# Soncresity Industries Website - Next.js Migration

## Project Overview
This is a company website migration from Vite to Next.js for Soncresity Industries. The site includes:
- Company pages (About, Contact)
- Projects showcase
- Tools section with Height Datapack Generator
- Blog for weekly updates (SI: Aftermath development)
- Professional SEO optimization

## Key Requirements
- Next.js 14 with App Router
- TypeScript for type safety
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- Blog functionality with proper SEO
- Video background and transparent styling
- ElectricBorder React component
- Height Datapack Generator tool (JSZip dependency)

## Architecture Notes
- Use App Router structure (/app directory)
- Implement proper metadata for each page
- Maintain existing component functionality
- Optimize images and assets
- Server-side rendering for better SEO
